roc, can you see the problem on the reduced testcase?
When zooming into the page, the red rectangle is not always 1px from the black border. Sometimes it is 2px (or white) from it, and the top and left side distance is not always the same. However, that may not be a real problem, just rounding issues, given the fractional numbers (99.8392283%) and the white rectangle intended to cover the red one may be positioned using different numbers, therefore rounds differently.
